course_title: Adult Gerontology Primary Care NP III
class_notes: Online with synchronous sessions TBD. On campus intensives TBD.
course_description: This course will differentiate among multiple complex presentations in adult populations to achieve optimal health outcomes. Evaluating treatment regimens, integrating interdisciplinary care and proposing innovative solutions to treat chronic disease at the micro, meso and macro level is emphasized.
prerequisites: NRSG 749D and NRSG 750D or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 2532, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: Staff, Status: Open
